Package library.rays

Class Ray

java.lang.Object
library.rays.Ray
public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
Ray class to define and project rays in a world.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Ray​(double direction, int distance)
    Convenience constructor with ray set at origin.

    Convenience constructor with ray set at origin.

    Constructor for a ray.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ray

      public Ray​(Vectors2D startPoint, Vectors2D direction, int distance)
      Constructor for a ray.
      Parameters:
      startPoint - The origin of the rays projection.
      direction - The direction of the ray points in radians.
      distance - The distance the ray is projected

      Convenience constructor with ray set at origin. Similar to Ray(Vectors2D, Vectors2D, int)
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the ray points in radians.
      distance - The distance the ray is projected

  • Method Details

    • setStartPoint

      public void setStartPoint​(Vectors2D v)
      Sets the origin of the rays projection.
      Parameters:
      v - Vectords2D positoin in world space.

    • getDirection

      public Vectors2D getDirection()
      Gets the direction of the ray in radians.
      Returns:
      direction variable of type Vectors2D.

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection​(Vectors2D newDirection)
      Sets the direction of the ray to a different value.
      Parameters:
      newDirection - Desired direction value

    • getRayInformation

      public RayInformation getRayInformation()

    • updateProjection

      public void updateProjection​(java.util.ArrayList<Body> bodiesToEvaluate)
      Updates the projection in world space and acquires information about the closest intersecting object with the ray projection.
      Parameters:
      bodiesToEvaluate - Arraylist of bodies to check if they intersect with the ray projection.

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, testbed.ColourSettings paintSettings, testbed.Camera camera)
      Debug draw method for ray projection.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
      camera - Camera class used to convert points from world space to view space
